Question
========

Of 8 subjects, before and after a given exertion of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 8 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 17 and the standard deviation is 33. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 1.46
* 1.69
* 3.52
* 10.04

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.46: Correct
* 1.69: Incorrect
* 3.52: Incorrect
* 10.04: Incorrect
